Name: Magic Exposure â€“ Yuri Visual Novel
About the game: Bianca's father is a myth buster who had to go on a long trip and asked his daughter to clean the house, especially the attic. When she did that, she found a strange old camera and used it to take pictures everywhere. What could be a normal experience turned upside down when she noticed something weird: the pictures showed something her father always told her about and she never truly believed: spirits from the underworld. Instead of being frightened, Bianca thought that was incredible until one of the creatures that Bianca photographed didn't like Bianca's new interest and decided to do anything so that Bianca deleted her photos, including spending a week pretending to be her best friend. Will she convince Bianca? Could Bianca find true love within a week?
